upgrades.name: Two Perfect
upgrades.description: Perfect! worth 2x points

upgrades.name: Repeat Offender
upgrades.description: Feedback gets progressively stronger as it's repeated

upgrades.name: Anarchy
upgrades.description: Each time you score all 5 Feedback types, multiply total score by 1.25x

upgrades.name: Goalie
upgrades.description: Can't miss! Misses are scored as stinky ):

upgrades.name: Bandit
upgrades.description: Hitting an arrow button at any time scores a small amount of points, increases each level

upgrades.name: Security Camera
upgrades.description: One random direction each round is always "Great!"

upgrades.name: Loaded Dice
upgrades.description: The next 25 misses are scored as perfects

upgrades.name: Sharpshooter
upgrades.description: Perfects are easier to hit

upgrades.name: Fertilizer
upgrades.description: All positive Feedback scores worth 1.25x more

upgrades.name: Houston
upgrades.description: Last arrow of song multiplies total score greatly based on Feedback

upgrades.name: Sloth
upgrades.description: Spawned arrows slightly slowed

upgrades.name: Marshmallow
upgrades.description: Skip upgrade this round and get all 3 next round

upgrades.name: Pressure Cooker
upgrades.description: Feedback worth more based on song difficulty

upgrades.name: Abacus
upgrades.description: Each Feedback type worth +1 each time it's received, resets each song

upgrades.name: The G-Train
upgrades.description: Good and great worth 5x. Perfect worth 0

upgrades.name: Gold Mine
upgrades.description: Golden arrows more likely to spawn (Golden arrows multiply score based on Feedback)

upgrades.name: After the Rain
upgrades.description: Rainbow arrows more likely to spawn (Rainbow arrows give random upgrade based on Feedback)

upgrades.name: Most Wanted
upgrades.description: Duplicate all upgrades. All Challenge severity's are now Very Hard

upgrades.name: Great Day
upgrades.description: Great! worth 3x points

upgrades.name: Good Graces
upgrades.description: Good worth 7x points

upgrades.name: Great Responsibility
upgrades.description: Stinky ): and Good now scored as Great!
